## Removing outliers from the data

```{r}
outliers <- c({{ paste0(paste0('"',outlier.ids,'"'),collapse = ',') }})
sdat <- dat[!dat[["{{ wid }}"]] %in% outliers,]
```

## Computation Kruskal-Wallis Test and Pairwise comparison

### Kruskal-Wallis test

```r
kruskal <- get.kruskal.test(sdat, "{{ dv }}", c({{ paste0(paste0('"',between,'"'), collapse = ',') }}))
(get.kruskal.table(kruskal))
```

```{r echo=FALSE}
kruskal <- get.kruskal.test(sdat, "{{ dv }}", c({{ paste0(paste0('"',between,'"'), collapse = ',') }}))
cnames <- c("var","n","df","statistic","effsize","magnitude","p", "p.signif")
kdf <- get.kruskal.table(kruskal)[,cnames]
kdf$p <- round(kdf$p, 3)
kdf$p[which(kdf$p< 0.001)] <- '<0.001'
kable(kdf, digits = 3)
```

### Pairwise comparison showing all comparisons

```r
pwc <- get.kruskal.pwc(sdat, "{{ dv }}", c({{ paste0(paste0('"',between,'"'), collapse = ',') }}), p.adjust.method="{{ p.adjust.method }}")
(get.kruskal.pwc.table(pwc))
```

```{r echo=FALSE}
pwc <- get.kruskal.pwc(sdat, "{{ dv }}", c({{ paste0(paste0('"',between,'"'), collapse = ',') }}), p.adjust.method="{{ p.adjust.method }}")
cnames <- c("var","group1","group2","n1","n2","estimate","statistic","p","p.adj","p.adj.signif")
kdf <- get.kruskal.pwc.table(pwc)[,cnames]
kdf$p <- round(kdf$p, 3)
kdf$p[which(kdf$p < 0.001)] <- '<0.001'
kdf$p.adj <- round(kdf$p.adj, 3)
kdf$p.adj[which(kdf$p.adj < 0.001)] <- '<0.001'
kable(kdf, digits = 3)
```
